data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Humacao, Puerto Rico. Please, stir the 16,484 believers here to pray for awakening.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Humacao, Puerto Rico

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Humacao, Puerto Rico and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Humacao, Puerto Rico that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 31,451 cultural Christians in the state of Humacao to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Punta Santiago
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Punta Santiago, Humacao, Puerto Rico.
Jesus, 50,700 people live in the state of Humacao. Please, give them 10 new simple churches this year.
Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Humacao.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.section_summary:
the state of Humacao, Puerto Rico has a population of 50,700.

We estimate Humacao has 16,484 people who might know Jesus, 31,451 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,764 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Humacao, Puerto Rico the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.
